body_html: Requesting API review. To rephrase, see @yongtang comment: GPU and CPU behave differently, one dropping negatives and the other one doesn't. We can leave the behavior undefined until we use drop_negatives, or just decide on a common behavior (error out or silently skip).

body: Requesting API review. To rephrase, see @yongtang comment: GPU and CPU behave differently, one dropping negatives and the other one doesn't. We can leave the behavior undefined until we use `drop_negatives`, or just decide on a common behavior (error out or silently skip).
